title: rajrajhans.com
subtitle: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio and blog site developed using GatsbyJS, with a focus on speed, SEO and a convinient blogging system.

title: GradGoggles
subtitle: Cross Platform Virtual Yearbook
description: A Virtual Yearbook and Scrapbook Platform for the #ClassOf2020. Recently crossed 200 users. Developed using Flask for the API and ReactJS for WebApp.

title: ExamSecure
subtitle: Automated Virtual Proctoring System
description: ExamSecure is a Automated Virtual Proctoring solution for remote exams that performs real-time image analysis on the candidates' webcam frames to ensure exam authenticity.

title: SafePass
subtitle: Simple and Secure Password Management
description: SafePass is a simple and secure password management tool with a Web App and an Android App developed using ReactJS, React Native & Firebase.

title: WeTalk
subtitle: Basic Social Network
description: A Flask based basic social networking website developed using Python, with PostgreSQL used as the DBMS and deployed on Heroku.

title: React-Chat
subtitle: A messenger-like chat WebApp
description: A fully functional instant messaging application using ReactJS and Firebase

title: ResultScrape
subtitle: Web Scraping, Flask API, React Frontend
description: Using ScraPy to scrape a website, building an API for that data using Flask and a webapp for that data using ReactJS.

title: Essay Editor Tool (API Integration)
subtitle: Identifies Spelling, Grammar, Punctuation mistakes
description: A tool to analyse your essay and run a spellcheck, grammar and punctuation check. Developed using  publicly available LanguageTool API in PHP.
